entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who is sleeping in her large cage next to his desk.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has come to tell Harry something important.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is surprised to see Dobby in his bedroom.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt whose high, false laugh can be heard from the living room.

relationships.description: Harry meets Dobby in his bedroom.
Harry owns Hedwig, who is sleeping next to his desk.
Dobby visits Harry in his bedroom.
Aunt Petunia is in the living room where her high, false laugh can be heard.
